name: Quick and Easy Hollandaise Sauce in the Microwave
author: scottki
summary: Quick and easy hollandaise sauce. Makes enough for 2 servings of eggs benedict or asparagus. I've tried several ways to make hollandaise sauce; this method works every time and is very quick. My kids love it. I put poached egg on toast or biscuit and top with sauce. I also add crumbled sausage with jalapeno and garlic.
ingredients: ¼  lemon, juiced, or to taste
directions: Beat egg yolks, lemon juice, salt, and cayenne pepper together in a microwave-safe bowl until smooth
Slowly stream melted butter into the egg yolk mixture while whisking to incorporate
Heat in microwave for 15 to 20 seconds; whisk
